ygData.subject: RE: OMG!  GZ finally replied
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It used to be pillage enchantment, but they changed it to nullify magic about a month ago.  My friends and I tested it pretty extensively in the Arena and
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 10 Nov 1999, James Schuldes wrote:
>
> Hmm a screen shot i looked at beofre posting showed it as PE not CM but i
> thot i remembered it as CM - maybe they changed it <sigh> And yes 5 charges
> - not sure how many icons it strips each time - hehe and it strips from top
> down so if you were heavily buffed...<click> goodbye symbols, goodbye valor,
> goodbye spirit armor, <click> goodbye sow... etc etc until goodbye root.

It used to be pillage enchantment, but they changed it to
nullify magic about a month ago. My friends and I tested it
pretty extensively in the Arena and it tended to follow LIFO
(last in first out) order when canceling icons, but didn't
always follow it.

> Does the cazic gate potion gate you to your bind spot or to the wizard gate
> in CT? I dont know if i'd wanna come out of Lguk hurtin' and be dropped
> into the CT maze - when you are real low HP even the green trash that is
> normally non-agro will be on you. For evac, you really wanna have a druid
> or wiz.

It drops you at the wizard gate in CT. That used to be fairly
safe when Cazic regularly had 50+ people in it camping for
rubicite. I dunno anymore. But given a choice between having
to run past hordes of L15-22 lizards to get to the zone, vs.
having to run past hordes of L35-45 frogs to get to the zone,
I would take the lizards.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
